result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn M Lovitz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Huber with standard release conditions.
AMENDED 5/26/2015:  SENTENCE CREDIT FOR 12 DAYS GRANTED IF REVOKED.

miscConds.notes: Cash bail to be applied to costs.  Paid in full.  Any remaining cash to be refunded to poster.
Follow through with sex offender treatment.

No contact with victim unless approved by Agent and related to child care/parenting issues.  No use or possession of alcohol/drug paraphernalia/drugs without a valid prescription. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety.
DNA Surcharge waived.
DNA Sample waived.
AMENDED 7/28/2015:  COURT ORDER DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE PER REQUEST BY DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS.
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Shawn M Lovitz in court with attorney Sydne French.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense intends to enter a change of plea.  Court passes matter to allow Attorney French to confirm final details with the defendant.  Case recalled at 10:03.  Defense is ready to proceed with plea and sentencing today.  State filed an Amended Information.    Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Statement by victim.  Statement by G.L.

Court orders the following:
- 6 months Huber with standard release conditions. STAYED
- 1 years Probation. 
- Court costs of $243.00; cash bail to be applied.  Any remaining cash to be refunded to poster.
- DNA Surcharge waived
- DNA Sample waived
- Conditions of Probation:  Follow through with sex offender treatment.  No contact with victim unless approved by Agent and related to child care/parenting issues.  Maintain absolute sobriety/Random UAs.  No use or possession of alcohol/drug paraphernalia/drugs without a valid prescription.
